location: Near Taipei Astronomical Museum (天文科學館)
notes: Older building from likely 1990s-2000s with traditional decor but clean condition and recently refinished light wood laminate flooring. Spacious unfurnished rooms with good natural light from large bay windows. No major baby safety concerns visible - no balcony access shown, no stairs, rounded crown molding. Convenient location near 7-Eleven and multiple bus lines (41, 557, 821). Building has 8 floors suggesting elevator likely present.
